channel.title: Making Monsters Drop?
channel.description:
Drops are located in item2, and item3. I know but it only gives me a few monsters like KBD heres the code:
[code]public static int KBD[] = {the items}[/code]
So thats only kbd how can i do like black demons? Thanks
